name: The Chronicles of Arden
description:
The Chronicles of Arden" is an RPG made with RPG Maker MV that follows the adventures of a young protagonist named Casey. In this thrilling tale, Casey plays a vital role in fulfilling an ancient prophecy that will determine the fate of their world. A great ancient evil is approaching, and only Casey has the strength and courage to stand against it.

Despite using mostly basic assets and some assets from Dragonbones, "The Chronicles of Arden" manages to create a somewhat, immersive world that players will get lost in.

This is my first game made with RPG Maker MV, and my first game in general. I was inspired to create it because I have always been a huge fan of  games, and I wanted to create a world and story that others could enjoy as much as I do.

Please note that "The Chronicles of Arden" is a short game, as it is my first time making a game and I simply wanted to have fun creating it. However, I am always looking for ways to improve and expand upon it, and any feedback from players is greatly appreciated. Thank you for your understanding and I hope you enjoy your time in the world of Arden!
